title: How to get rid of post footer from a blogspot blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Removing footer from blogspot is not big task. Just follow the steps I am sharing below.. Hope it helps. Go to your blogger dashboardClick on templatesClick on edit HTMLSearch for this .post-footer{ (use ctrl +f to search)Now add this code after the above line - display:none;Click on save template.That's it .. Now check you page , you won't find the footer..

the primary customization can be done without touching the coding part in the following way. click on layoutclick on blog posts sectionhere you will be able to see the post footer options and you can simply enable or disable it from it. It was just a matter of enabling and disabling.
